languages.text: {n}Стальные пальцы Инквизитора сжимают плечо крепче.{/n} "Наборот — перерождаетесь. Повторяйте молитву, {name}".
{n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Стальные пальцы Инквизитора сжимают плечо крепче.{/n} "Наборот — перерождаетесь. Повторяйте молитву, {name}".

languages.text: {n}大审判官的手指紧紧钳制住了你的肩膀。{/n}“恰恰相反，你正在重生。重复我的祷词，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长的手指紧紧钳制住了你的肩膀。{/n}“恰恰相反，你正在重生。重复我的祷词，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}異端審問官はより一層強く、あなたの肩を掴んだ。{/n}「いいや、逆だ。お前は生まれ変わる。{name}、祈りを繰り返すのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}異端審問官はより一層強く、あなたの肩を掴んだ。{/n}「いいや、逆だ。お前は生まれ変わる。{name}、祈りを繰り返すのだ」

languages.text: {n}Los dedos del Inquisidor aprietan con fuerza tu hombro.{/n} «Al contrario. Está renaciendo. Repita la oración, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los dedos del Inquisidor aprietan con fuerza tu hombro.{/n} «Al contrario. Está renaciendo. Repita la oración, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Die stählernen Finger des Inquisitors umklammern deine Schulter noch fester.{/n} "Ganz im Gegenteil. Ihr werdet wiedergeboren. Sprecht das Gebet nach, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die stählernen Finger des Inquisitors umklammern deine Schulter noch fester.{/n} "Ganz im Gegenteil. Ihr werdet wiedergeboren. Sprecht das Gebet nach, {name}."

languages.text: {n}L'inquisiteur affermit sa prise sur votre épaule.{/n} « Détrompez-vous. Vous êtes sur le point de renaître. Répétez la prière, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'inquisiteur affermit sa prise sur votre épaule.{/n} « Détrompez-vous. Vous êtes sur le point de renaître. Répétez la prière, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Engizisyoncu'nun parmakları, omzunu daha da sıkı tutuyor.{/n} "Aksine baştan doğuyorsun. Duayı tekrar et {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Inquisitor's fingers tighten their steely grip on your shoulder.{/n} "On the contrary. You are being reborn. Repeat the prayer, {name}."
